mapper.insert:
select fp_pdreview_seq.nextval from dual
insert into fp_pdreview(review_no, pd_no, mem_no, review_content, review_score) values(#{reviewNo},#{pdNo}, #{memNo}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewScore})
mapper.select: select p.*, m.mem_name, m.mem_pic from fp_pdreview p join fp_mem m on p.mem_no=m.mem_no where pd_no=#{pdNo}
